name: @christiangalsterer/mongodb-driver-prometheus-exporter
author: Christian Galsterer
description: Prometheus exporter to monitor the MongoDB Node.js driver

scripts.ci: pnpm i --prod=false && pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && pnpm run build && pnpm run test && pnpm run renovate:config
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run clean:deps
scripts.release:prepare: pnpm run clean && pnpm i && pnpm i --prod=false && pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && pnpm run build && pnpm run test
scripts.release:major: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version major -m 'build(release): release %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version minor -m 'build(release): release %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version patch -m 'build(release): release %s' && git push && git push --tags
